pages.title: Specials
pages.text: $(#25228d)Allows Aquatic Plants to be planted on land.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Creates Water Tiles in a 3x3 area around it. Water tiles disappear after some time unless planted on.

$(br2)$(#bd951a)As a member of the fire brigade, Dripphylleia has extreme enthusiasm for extinguishing fire, down to the smallest flame, and always carries ice water for cooling down very hot objects.
